findings.title: RRS - Redundant Require Statement
findings.description: Redundant require statement in the `_mint` function.

findings.title: RCC - Redundant Condition Check
findings.description: Redundant condition check in the code.

findings.title: MEE - Missing Events Emission
findings.description: The contract performs actions and state mutations from external methods that do not result in the emission of events.

findings.title: RVD - Redundant Variable Declaration
findings.description: The `mintedByAstroVerse` variable is declared but not used.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: State variables that are initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards can be declared as immutable.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the `constant` keyword.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not conform to Solidity naming conventions.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: An unused state variable is declared in the contract.

findings.title: L08 - Tautology or Contradiction
findings.description: A tautology or contradiction can lead to unintended behavior and make the code harder to understand and maintain.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Dead code is present in the contract, which can increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured on user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values.

findings.title: L17 - Usage of Solidity Assembly
findings.description: Using assembly can be useful for optimizing code but it can also be error-prone.
